kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=BaseURI, url=http://localhost:3333, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3333/partners path_url=/partners headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'auth_user': 'qa', 'auth_password': 'ninja', 'Content-Length': '129'} body=b'{"name": "Mercearia do Joaquim", "email": "contato01@joaquim.com.br", "whatsapp": "41999999999", "business": "Conveni\\u00eancia"}'

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3333/partners path_url=/partners headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'auth_user': 'qa', 'auth_password': 'ninja', 'Content-Length': '123'} body=b'{"name": "Mercadinho do Baixin", "email": "contato01@baixin.com.br", "whatsapp": "51777777777", "business": "Supermercado"}'

kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3333/partners path_url=/partners headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'auth_user': 'qa', 'auth_password': 'ninja', 'Content-Length': '126'} body=b'{"name": "Restaurante KiGostoso", "email": "contato01@kigostoso.com.br", "whatsapp": "31666666666", "business": "Restaurante"}'

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:3333/partners path_url=/partners headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'auth_user': 'qa', 'auth_password': 'ninja'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://localhost:3333/partners status=200, reason=OK headers={'X-Powered-By': 'Express', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'Access-Control-Expose-Headers': 'Authorization,auth_user,auth_password', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'Content-Length': '1481', 'ETag': 'W/"5c9-mIzRwiKFFu1eq0iJ1MJhqsjK16U"', 'Date': 'Fri, 23 Sep 2022 16:59:08 GMT', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Keep-Alive': 'timeout=5'} body=[{"_id":"632de5dbca112498e11a3b91","name":"Restaurante KiGostoso","email":"contato01@kigostoso.com.br","whatsapp":"31666666666","business":"Restaurante","active":false,"created_at":"2022-09-23T16:59:07.796Z","updated_at":"2022-09-23T16:59:07.796Z"},{"_id":"632de5dbca112498e11a3b8f","name":"Mercadinho do Baixin","email":"contato01@baixin.com.br","whatsapp":"51777777777","business":"Supermercado","active":false,"created_at":"2022-09-23T16:59:07.613Z","updated_at":"2022-09-23T16:59:07.613Z"},{"_id":"632de5dbca112498e11a3b8d","name":"Mercearia do Joaquim","email":"contato01@joaquim.com.br","whatsapp":"41999999999","business":"Conveniência","active":false,"created_at":"2022-09-23T16:59:07.432Z","updated_at":"2022-09-23T16:59:07.432Z"},{"_id":"632de41cca112498e11a3b89","name":"Restaurante KiGostoso","email":"contato01@kigostoso.com.br","whatsapp":"31666666666","business":"Restaurante","active":false,"created_at":"2022-09-23T16:51:40.034Z","updated_at":"2022-09-23T16:51:40.034Z"},{"_id":"632de41bca112498e11a3b87","name":"Mercadinho do Baixin","email":"contato01@baixin.com.br","whatsapp":"51777777777","business":"Supermercado","active":false,"created_at":"2022-09-23T16:51:39.847Z","updated_at":"2022-09-23T16:51:39.847Z"},{"_id":"632de41bca112498e11a3b85","name":"Mercearia do Joaquim","email":"contato01@joaquim.com.br","whatsapp":"41999999999","business":"Conveniência","active":false,"created_at":"2022-09-23T16:51:39.581Z","updated_at":"2022-09-23T16:51:39.581Z"}]

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.
